comments.author: cryptoperkele
comments.body: Oh wow, this ico is illegal in so many ways. Good luck winning court cases if this ever launching or god forbit going up in cmc. You are literally trying to make money with other copyright protected brands. And ANY brand could issue easily their own token but there's a good reason why they are not doing that. It's a legal nightmare to deal with and isn't worth it. But i guess your team has better laywers then these multi million corporations.Well, can't say i didn't warn you.
